title: AI Product Categories: A Mental Map
description: A short lesson to help you apply AI Product Categories: A Mental Map.

hook.text: Not every AI product is a chatbot. The landscape is much wider than you think.

buildup.text: Categories: search, recommendations, content generation, automation, analytics, and copilots.

discovery.text: Each category has different data needs, latency requirements, and user expectations.

climax.text: Map your product's pain points to AI categories before choosing a solution.

punchline.text: Start with the problem, not the technology.

quiz.question: What's the best approach when adding AI to a product?
options: Start with the user problem, then find the AI solution
